alert.note: Alert for Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 513 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chipley. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Bonifay, Brock Crossroad, Chipley Municipal Airport, Bahoma, Poplar Head and Johnson Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
